itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 5, 2013
contentencoded:
Unemployment figures for the month of August will be released Friday morning. One early piece of positive news came out on Thursday: the number of people who had to file for unemployment benefits fell again over the last week. Diane Swonk, chief economist at Mesirow Financial, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.

Click the audio player above to hear more.
description: Less people filed for unemployment over the last week. But layoff announcements went up.
title: Some positive news leading up to Friday's jobs numbers
teaser: Less people filed for unemployment over the last week. But layoff announcements went up.
